publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4278 Colin Fox: Payment Cuts for Miscarriage of Justice—That the Parliament notes with concern proposals announced by the Home Secretary, Charles Clarke, to withdraw compensation payments to people who have been falsely imprisoned; believes that proposals to cut payments to people who have been the victims of a miscarriage of justice are unwelcome; supports plans to increase the monies available to people who are the victims of crime but believes it is unacceptable for this money to be taken from those who have been the victims of a miscarriage of justice by the state when it takes away the liberty of innocent people, often for many years, and calls on the Scottish Executive to announce publicly that it has no plans for Scotland to follow Westminster’s path. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
